languages.text: "И это я еще не заостряю внимание на том факте, что в сопровождение обычного подданного входит ксенос". {n}Взгляд Мастера Печатей устремляется к Ирлиэт.{/n} "В отсутствие официального посвящения вы, технически говоря, прямо здесь и сейчас, на глазах десятков людей, творите ересь".

"That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches onto Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."
languages.original_text: "И это я еще не заостряю внимание на том факте, что в сопровождение обычного подданного входит ксенос". {n}Взгляд Мастера Печатей устремляется к Ирлиэт.{/n} "В отсутствие официального посвящения вы, технически говоря, прямо здесь и сейчас, на глазах десятков людей, творите ересь".

traits.locale_text: "That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches on to Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

traits.locale_text: "That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches onto Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « Et je n'évoque même pas le fait que l'humble sujet en question est {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} d'une xénos. » {n}Le regard de la maîtresse des sceaux se pose sur Yrliet.{/n} « Votre intronisation officielle n'ayant pas encore eu lieu, vous commettez, en cet instant précis et devant des dizaines de témoins, ce qui s'avère, techniquement parlant, un acte d'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: "That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches onto Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."

traits.locale_text: « Et je n'évoque même pas le fait que l'humble sujet en question est {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} d'une xénos. » {n}Le regard du maître des sceaux se pose sur Yrliet.{/n} « Votre intronisation officielle n'ayant pas encore eu lieu, vous commettez, en cet instant précis et devant des dizaines de témoins, ce qui s'avère, techniquement parlant, un acte d'hérésie. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「その地味な臣下が異種族と一緒だということは言うまでもない」{n}印章長の視線がユリエットに注がれる。{/n}「正式な入団式がまだ行われていないことを考えれば、厳密には、あなたは今ここで、何十人もの証人の前で異端行為を行っていることになります」
languages.original_text: "That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches onto Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."

traits.locale_text: 「その地味な臣下が異種族と一緒だということは言うまでもない」{n}印章長の視線がユリエットに注がれる。{/n}「正式な入団式がまだ行われていないことを考えれば、厳密には、あなたは今ここで、何十人もの証人の前で異端行為を行っていることになります」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “而且我还没有提到，这位卑微的请愿者身边竟然还有一位异形。”{n}印章大师的目光死死地盯着伊莉耶特。{/n}“鉴于你的继任颂礼尚未正式举行，严格地说，你此刻正在数十名证人面前公然举行异端行为。”
languages.original_text: "That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches onto Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."

traits.locale_text: “而且我还没有提到，这位卑微的请愿者身边竟然还有一位异形。”{n}印章大师的目光死死地盯着伊莉耶特。{/n}“鉴于你的继任颂礼尚未正式举行，严格地说，你此刻正在数十名证人面前公然举行异端行为。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Ganz zu schweigen von der Tatsache, dass besagter bescheidener Untertan von einem Xenos begleitet wird." {n}Der Blick des Meisters der Siegel bleibt an Yrliet heften.{/n} "Angesichts der Tatsache, dass Eure offizielle Einführung noch aussteht, begeht Ihr streng genommen hier und jetzt einen Akt der Ketzerei, vor Dutzenden von Zeugen."
languages.original_text: "That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches onto Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."

traits.locale_text: "Ganz zu schweigen von der Tatsache, dass besagter bescheidener Untertan von einem Xenos begleitet wird." {n}Der Blick des Meisters der Siegel bleibt an Yrliet heften.{/n} "Angesichts der Tatsache, dass Eure offizielle Einführung noch aussteht, begeht Ihr streng genommen hier und jetzt einen Akt der Ketzerei, vor Dutzenden von Zeugen."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Por si fuera poco, es otr{mf|o|a} súbdit{mf|o|a} más que aparece en compañía de xenos». {n}La Maestra de Sellos mira fijamente a Yrliet.{/n} «Dado que la inducción oficial todavía no ha tenido lugar, está cometiendo técnicamente un acto de herejía delante de numerosos testigos».
languages.original_text: "That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches onto Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."

traits.locale_text: «Por si fuera poco, es otr{mf|o|a} súbdit{mf|o|a} más que aparece en compañía de xenos». {n}La Maestra de Sellos mira fijamente a Yrliet.{/n} «Dado que la inducción oficial todavía no ha tenido lugar, está cometiendo técnicamente un acto de herejía delante de numerosos testigos».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Ayrıca naçizane bir vatandaş olarak yanınızda bir zeno olmasını es geçiyorum zaten." {n}Mühür Üstadı'nın bakışı, Yrliet'e takılıyor.{/n} "Henüz resmî olarak göreve başlamadığınızı göz önünde tutacak olursak şu an yaptıklarınız teknik olarak kâfirliğe giriyor. Hem de onlarca tanığın önünde."
languages.original_text: "That's not even mentioning the fact that said humble subject is accompanied by a xenos." {n}The gaze of the Master of Seals latches onto Yrliet.{/n} "Given that your official induction has yet to take place, you are, technically speaking, performing an act of heresy here and now, in front of dozens of witnesses."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca naçizane bir vatandaş olarak yanınızda bir zeno olmasını es geçiyorum zaten." {n}Mühür Üstadı'nın bakışı, Yrliet'e takılıyor.{/n} "Henüz resmî olarak göreve başlamadığınızı göz önünde tutacak olursak şu an yaptıklarınız teknik olarak kâfirliğe giriyor. Hem de onlarca tanığın önünde."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals
